pageContext.description: Edge badly dented; one flange slightly bent; dent on one side of blade
pageContext.patina: Rich green patina, mostly rubbed off, exposing yellow metal
pageContext.surface: Slightly pitted, especially on one face.
pageContext.other: Width: butt 20mm; centre 22mm; edge 54mm,Thickness: centre 21mm; 8mm,Weight: 8 oz. = 226.796gms
pageContext.site: England, hampshire,nursling,patterson's gravel pit,1/4 miles ne of nursling church,while digging for gravel,january 1931
pageContext.remarks: The surface of the field contains quantities of fire-injured flints, and a [?gone] of such flints is traceable about 2 ft. below the surface;  a few rudely-worked flints have been picked up on the surface.
